context: The word 'nimeks' is an Estonian word that means 'name is', 'called', or 'named'. It is used to identify what someone or something's name is, often in the pattern '[Subject] nimeks on [Name]' meaning '[Subject]'s name is [Name]', or '[Subject] nimeks sai/oleb/etc. [Name]' meaning '[Subject] got/was named/is called [Name]'. It can also be used as an alternative to 'nimeliselt' in some contexts.
